title: Smart Data Models - Energy / Three Phase AC Measurement
description: An electrical  measurement from a system that uses three phase alternating current.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type. It must be equal to Flight.

timestamp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Reported date time creation corresponding to this observation.

capturedVideo.description: Property.  It contains information for the captured video.

name.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name corresponding to this video.

width.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Width corresponding to this video.

height.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Height corresponding to this video.

fps.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Frames Per Second corresponding to this video.

startingPointOfFlight.description: Property. It contains information for the starting point of the flight.

gimbalPitch.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Gimbal Pitch corresponding to this point of flight.

altitude.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Altitude corresponding to this point of flight.

heading.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Heading corresponding to this point of flight.

latitude.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Latitude corresponding to this point of flight.

longitude.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Longitude corresponding to this point of flight.

videoFileFromFlight.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. URL providing video file from the flight corresponding to this observation

thumbnailVideoFile.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. URL providing thumbnail video file from the flight corresponding to this observation

metadataFileFromFlight.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. URL providing metadata file from the flight corresponding to this observation

shapeFileWithFlightInformation.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. URL providing shape file with flight information corresponding to this observation. It must be geojson file

detectedObject.description: Property. It captures the object detected in the flight and some related metadata, i.e., the trajectory of the UAV flight, the typeOfObject (e.g., boat, person)

trajectory.description: Trajectory. Trajectory of the UAV flight

timestamp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Reported date time creation corresponding to this observation.

refUAV.description: Relationship. Flight is operated by UAV
